name: Phonebooth Mimicry
description:
Find the right phone booth by interacting with 'E' ! If you find the wrong one, you'll discover a mimic instead that will chase you! 

(Try the faster phonebooth setting in "Extras" for a challenge!)

SPACE - Dash

E - Interact

WASD - Move

NOTE: There might be a lag due to bug(s)!
